cs34q.turtle

Interface TurtleListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TurtleDisplay

    public interface TurtleListener
    A class that listens (and reacts to) the changes to a turtle's state.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void displaced(Turtle source, double srcX, double srcY)
      Callback invoked whenever the turtle is displaced.
      void penStateChanged(Turtle source)
      Callback invoked whenever the turtle's pen state changes.
      void sentHome(Turtle source)
      Callback invoked whenever the turtle is sent home.
      void turned(Turtle source, double initBearing)
      Callback invoked whenever the turtle's bearing changes.

    • Method Detail

      • displaced

        void displaced(Turtle source,
               double srcX,
               double srcY)
        Callback invoked whenever the turtle is displaced.
        Parameters:
        source - The turtle that invoked this callback.
        srcX - The x coordinate of the turtle before the displacement.
        srcY - The y coordinate of the turtle before the displacement.

      • turned

        void turned(Turtle source,
            double initBearing)
        Callback invoked whenever the turtle's bearing changes.
        Parameters:
        source - The turtle that invoked this callback.
        initBearing - The bearing (in radians) of the turtle before the turn

      • penStateChanged

        void penStateChanged(Turtle source)
        Callback invoked whenever the turtle's pen state changes.
        Parameters:
        source - The turtle that invoked this callback.

      • sentHome

        void sentHome(Turtle source)
        Callback invoked whenever the turtle is sent home.
        Parameters:
        source - The Turtle instance that invoked this callback.
